info.title: sys-con 1.x (2024)
info.author: o0Zz
info.details:
Connect any USB controller to your Nintendo Switch.

Sys-con v1.x is a Nintendo Switch module that adds support for all HID and XID joysticks and gamepads to the Nintendo Switch.

Support all USB controllers: PC controllers, Wheels, Dualshock 3, Dualshock 4, Dualsense (PS5), XBOX, XBOX360, XBOXONE, ...

changelog: Fixed 8BitDo Wireless Bluetooth USB Adapter 2 (#65)\nFixed controller gamecube adapter cause a kernel panic (#59)
